General.Name: Hubei Zhenhua Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Hubei Zhenhua Chemical Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of chromium salt and other related products in China. The company's products portfolio includes sodium bichromate, chromic acid anhydride, crystal chromic acid anhydride, liquid chromic anhydride, chrome oxide green, potassium dichromate, chrome sulphate, vitamin K3, sodium sulphate, aluminium hydroxide, and other products, as well as metal chrome. It also exports its products to various countries and regions in Europe, the United States, Africa, and Southeast Asia. The company was formerly known as Huanghsi Zhenhua Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. Hubei Zhenhua Chemical Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Huangshi, China.

4.Name: Mr. Qian Yan  Chen
4.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
